name: Adventure of Adam
description:
Hey welcome to my first desktop game!

This game is still prototype and under development.

Enjoy it!

Controller:

(Keyboard):

S - Roll

D - Attack

UP - Jump

RIGHT and LEFT ARROW - Run

(XBOX Controller):

Y - Roll

X - Attack

A - Jump

RIGHT and LEFT D-PAD or ANALOG - Run

If there something bug in the game please give me some feedback so I can't FIX the bug
